articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: On impeachment, a head-in-the-sand caucus takes shape
articles.description: On impeachment, a "heads-in-the-sand" caucus is taking shape in the Senate, and it appears Marco Rubio is eager to be its leader.
articles.content: When former White House National Security Adviser John Bolton announced yesterday that he’s willing to testify during Donald Trump’s impeachment trial, it quickly jolted the political debate. Indeed, it created a challenge Senate Republicans would have prefer… [+3601 chars]

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Threats to the US still exist despite Soleimani killing, says senator
articles.description: Sen. Bob Menendez, D-NJ, of the Foreign Relations Committee, and former CIA Director John Brennan discuss the threats the U.S. faces following the death of Gen. Soleimani.

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Pentagon contradicts Trump on targeting...
articles.description: It appears no government agency has been more willing to publicly contradict Trump than the Department of Defense.
articles.content: On Saturday, Donald Trump declared via Twitter that he’d identified a series of Iranian targets, which the president said he’s prepared to attack if Iran retaliates for the killing of Gen. Qassem Soleimani. Some of the targets, the Republican added, are impor… [+3175 chars]

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Lindsey Graham felt different about witnesses in 1999
articles.description: As John Bolton has now said he would testify in the Senate impeachment trial if subpoenaed, Sen. Lindsey Graham said Bolton should have testified in the House hearing. Observe how then Rep. Graham felt about witnesses in 1999.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Morning Joe welcomes the return of Kasie Hunt
articles.description: MSNBC's own Kasie Hunt returns after time off spent with her new baby son Mars Hunt Rivera.

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Trump admin accidentally says it's withdrawing troops from Iraq
articles.description: We've grown accustomed to the routine, everyday dysfunction surrounding Trump and his team, but once in a while, there are cringe-worthy examples that stand out
articles.content:
Iraq withdrawal letter screw-up shows Pentagon tainted by Trump 
The Iranian general who replaced Qassem Soleimani announced yesterday that he has a specific goal. We promise to continue down martyr Soleimani’s path as firmly as before with help of God, and … [+1937 chars]
